data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Kalat, Baluchistan, Pakistan will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kalat, Baluchistan, Pakistan

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Kalat a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.section_summary: On average, 73 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Kalat, Baluchistan, Pakistan.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Kalat.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Kalat access to a Bible in their own language.

Father, I pray that the Brahui (original nucleus) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Brahui (original nucleus) people know you.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Kalat, Baluchistan, Pakistan to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Kalat. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Kalat
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

location.name: Kalat
location.people_groups_list: Baloch Dombki, Darzada, Dehwar, Baloch Magasi, Med
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Baloch Dombki (35,000), Darzada (180,000), Dehwar (69,000), Baloch Magasi (103,000), Med (26,000)
